resources.string: To use Sound Amplifier, you need to allow microphone, phone, notification and camera permissions. You can update this in device Settings.

Sound Amplifier makes weak sounds louder without making powerful sounds too loud

How to use Sound Amplifier
1. Plug in wired headphones or connect Bluetooth headphones
2. Start Sound Amplifier
Use Sound Amplifier with headphones to enhance audio quality around you and on your device
